TestCase.CaseDescription: Insert a new course with non-existing scheduleId -- queries should fail Expected Error: Cannot add or update due to referential integrity
TestCase.SQLScript: insert into Courses (courseId, courseName, courseNumber, majorId, scheduleId, stateId, description) values ('64015c46-6724-11e5-b364-0a184912e292', 'new course', 1000, 2, 4, 'On', 'test schedule');
